name: 'At The Moment'
description:
Fifi is an ordinary 17-year-old girl. One day, an accident puts her in a coma. Unsure whether it is in reality or in a dream, she meets the Ferryman, a wise man who guides the spirits of the dead.

So begins Fifi's journey about finding the meaning of identity, love, and life. 

What do you see AT THE MOMENT?

What will you choose in the end?

This is my first narrative game using Unity/Fungus. 

Music and sounds: all from non-copyright platforms.

Strongly recommend playing it full-screen!

All the characters and visuals as well as the story scripts were created by myself. The visual style of the game was decided in the style of pixel art which I hope to bring a retro feel to the game.

It takes about 10 minutes to play the whole game. The different options also unlock different story branches and endings.

Enjoy playing！

A game by Zheyi Liu
